Reviews.Title: “Thanks but No thanks. No more cheap hotels for me.”
Reviews.Author: Jeremy S
Reviews.Content: booked hollywood inn express mothers day weekend 2011 3 nights worse motel 6 hotelscom speed wifi free breakfast morning smelled bad office owner computer doing whatever didnt greet finally sick waiting excuse couldnt name system paid weeks advance reciept sudden popped computer breakfast told false free wifi told wasnt free anyway hotelscom free wifi barely laptop slow parking lot extra goodluck getting beds hard smells horrible werent cleaned express hotel name brand holiday inn express
